column2:
"Are you saying that you think you
should not refuse my invitation?"

"Hahaha! It’s ok if you turn me down
although I think surely it would be a
meaning and practical training for you!"

"For the sake of becoming a pure and
righteous Samurai, you need to work
hard just a little bit more!"

"Speaking of which, I think I have not
visited Greenscape for quite some
time. I'll rely on you to lead, ok?"

"おねえさんに誘われたからには
断るわけにいかないって？"

"あはは！
別に断っちゃダメってことはないけど
きっと有意義な実戦訓練になるよ！"

"清く正しいブレイバーのため
もうひとがんばり、ってヤツだ！"

"そういえば、わたし
森林エリアって久しぶりだなあ。
しっかり先導、よろしくね。"
